articles.description: Live reaction as Manchester City win fourth Premier League title in-a-row, denying Arsenal, plus Jurgen Klopp leaves Liverpool with a win in his final match.
articles.title: Reaction as Manchester City win record fourth successive Premier League title

articles.description: Xander Schauffele birdies the last hole to see off the challenge of Bryson DeChambeau and Viktor Hovland to win his first major title.
articles.title: US PGA Championship: Xander Schauffele beats Bryson DeChambeau and Viktor Hovland

articles.description: Why Manchester City's fourth successive Premier League title proves they are the domestic game's great untouchables.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola turns City into Premier League's great untouchables

articles.description: The Minnesota Timberwolves knock defending NBA champions Denver Nuggets out of the play-offs by winning their series decider.
articles.title: NBA: Minnesota Timberwolves knock holders Denver Nuggets out of play-offs

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his Team of the Season?
articles.title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Season: Erling Haaland, Phil Foden, William Saliba, Ollie Watkins, Bukayo Saka

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler says he is "tired and ready to get home" after being charged with assault during the US PGA Championship.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler 'fairly tired' in wake of assault charge at US PGA Championship

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries and follow live text coverage from day four of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship 2024, day four - radio & text

articles.description: With 100 days to go until the Paris Paralympics, BBC Sport guides you through the sports, the venues and how many gold medals can be won.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: Guide to Paris Games - dates, venues and sports

articles.description: Watch the best moments from nine years of departing manager Jurgen Klopp's news conferences at Liverpool.
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp: Departing Liverpool manager's best news conference quotes

articles.description: A post Premier League-season friendly between Tottenham and Newcastle in Australia is described as "madness" by Alan Shearer.
articles.title: Alan Shearer: Newcastle v Tottenham friendly is 'madness'
